title: QUEST FOR INFAMY-POSTMORTEM
description:
:::::::::: POSTMORTEM PRESENTS ::::::::::


:::: QUEST FOR INFAMY ::::


::Information::


P O S T M O R T E M
2 0 1 4

presents for nothin but our pleasure

Quest for Infamy
(c) Adventure Game Studio

Release-Date: 07/14
Protection: Disc.Count: 1 DVD
Game.Type: Adventure
Language: English

G A M E N O T E S

You're Mr. Roehm, a fellow out on the lam after getting
into a few scrapes and for taking liberties with a local
baron's daughter. Escaping his clutches, you catch a
ride to a new land - and discover that you don't find
trouble - trouble finds you

G R O U P N O T E S

We have enough money, beer, girls or whatever at the moment

Besides:

POSTMORTEM will not pre any updates
or patches. Don't like that idea?
* BUY THE GAME! *

G R E E T i N G S

Skid Row, Unleashed
GREENPEACE
0x0007, Genesis

It's just a competition!
Support the Software-Developer
if you like this game!

<gDFS>


System Requirements:

Minimum: 
OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7 or 8 
Processor: 900 Mhz 
Memory: 128 MB RAM 
Graphics: Direct X Compatible Graphics Card 
DirectX: Version 5.2 
Hard Drive: 1800 MB available space 
Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound Card

Recommended: 
OS: Windows 7 or 8 
Processor: 1.2 Ghz 
Memory: 256 MB RAM 
Graphics: Direct X Compatible Graphics Card 
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space 
Sound Card: Direct X Compatible Sound Card
